name: Another Life
description:
NOT SUITABLE FOR PEOPLE UNDER THE AGE OF 15

Made in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2022

Writer & Illustrator - Isabeau Colls

Sound Designer & Voice Over - Morgan Ridley-Smith

Programmer - Jake Berry

Another Life is an immersive narrative experience set in a post-apocalyptic landscape. The game follows you through a journey to find medical supplies before it's too late. With no one by your side but an unknown voice following you, every choice you make matters. 

 Will you make the right choices?
